attributes.action: keep olympic stadium as a National stadium and keep it a 80k seater
attributes.additional_details: The Olympic Stadium is quickly becoming an iconic building for the nation.  The Olympics Opening Ceremony sealed it as a venue that must be retained as it is and used by the Nation for wonderful events.  The Millennium Dome survived very successfully - lets make the Olympic Stadium move into the iconic status it deserves as an eighty thousand seater stadium.
